actions.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Agriculture. Report No: 99-127.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: A bill to extend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act, as amended, for one year.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture with amendment, H. Rept. 99-127) Amends the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to authorize FY 1986 appropriations for pesticide control. Limits amounts that may be used for pesticide research.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act, as amended, for one year.
